lines.text: This is the answering machine of Mrs. Nebel and her stupid boyfriend. If you want to leave a message...
Jenni, don't bullshit me. Give me your mother. It's urgent.
I just said this to keep the man away who calls little girls and tells them to put a metal stick into a power outlet or to throw a hairdryer into the bathtub. She's not there.
You might want to ask before you take something.
I still miss the magic word.
